headlines.description: Manchester United's chances of finishing in the top four were dented after suffering a 1-0 defeat against struggling Everton.
headlines.shortLinkText: Man Utd stumble to loss at struggling Everton

headlines.description: Arsenal slipped to a shock 2-1 defeat against Brighton on Saturday as their hopes of finishing in the top four took a huge blow.
headlines.shortLinkText: Arsenal UCL hopes fade with shock Brighton loss

headlines.description: Mason Mount and Timo Werner both scored twice as Chelsea put a bad week behind them to beat Southampton 6-0 at St. Mary's in the Premier League.
headlines.shortLinkText: Mount, Werner score doubles as Chelsea win 6-0

headlines.description: A revitalised Leeds United took a big step towards Premier League survival with a 3-0 victory over Watford at Vicarage Road on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Rejuvenated Leeds dent Watford's survival hopes

headlines.description: Tottenham eased to a 4-0 victory at Aston Villa to boost their chances of a top four finish and Champions League football next season.
headlines.shortLinkText: Son hat trick inspires big Spurs win at Villa
